property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition

property.name: Type
property.value: Psychic Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Machine Hero

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked and blocked.) ■ Awaken—At the end of each turn, if another of your psychic creatures awakened that turn, flip this creature to its higher cost side. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Draw a card. ■ Choose one of the following: ► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone: ► Put a water psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Draw a card. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose a player and choose up to 2 cards from their graveyard. That player puts the chosen cards on top of their deck and shuffles it. ■ Choose one of the following: ► Put a psychic creature that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone: ► Put a light or water creature that costs 4 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition

property.value: Death Puppet

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, look at your opponent's hand and discard a card from it.

property.value: DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy it.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Choose one of the following: ► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone: ► Put a darkness psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker".

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your darkness creatures and nature creatures in the battle zone has "speed attacker." (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy one of your opponent’s creatures that has 3000 power or less. ■ Choose one of the following: ► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone: ► Put a fire psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker" and power 4000 or less. ■ Choose one of the following: ► Put a psychic creature that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone: ► Put a Fire or Nature psychic creature that costs 4 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.value: DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition
